mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT (User_seq, Rent_seq, name, address, phone, payment, receiveMethod, returnMethod, accountName, paymentMethod, optional) VALUES (#{0}, 1, #{dto.name}, #{dto.address}, #{dto.phone}, #{dto.payment}, #{dto.receiveMethod}, #{dto.returnMethod}, #{dto.accountName}, #{dto.paymentMethod}, #{dto.optional})
mapper.select: SELECT P.SEQ, L.EMAIL, P.NAME, P.PHONE, P.RENT_SEQ, P.PAYMENT, P.ORDERDATE FROM USER AS U, PAYMENT AS P, LOGIN AS L WHERE U.SEQ = P.USER_SEQ AND L.SEQ = U.LOGIN_SEQ AND P.SEQ = (SELECT p.seq FROM Payment as p, User WHERE p.User_seq = User.seq AND User.seq = #{0} ORDER BY p.seq DESC LIMIT 1);
SELECT c.qty, p.price, c.startDate, c.endDate, c.rentDay FROM Cart AS c, Product AS p WHERE p.seq = c.Product_seq AND p.seq = 2 ;
